C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

command:
mkdir -p /bitnami/postgresql/data
chmod 700 /bitnami/postgresql/data
find /bitnami/postgresql -mindepth 0 -maxdepth 1 -not -name ".snapshot" -not -name "lost+found" | \
  xargs chown -R 1001:1001
chmod -R 777 /dev/shm
initContainers.name: init-chmod-data

command: until pg_isready -h release-name-postgresql -p 5432 -U test; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: check-db-ready

command: until nslookup k8s-example-user-code-1; do echo waiting for user service; sleep 2; done
initContainers.name: init-user-deployment-k8s-example-user-code-1

command: until pg_isready -h release-name-postgresql -p 5432 -U test; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
initContainers.name: check-db-ready

command: until nslookup k8s-example-user-code-1; do echo waiting for user service; sleep 2; done
initContainers.name: init-user-deployment-k8s-example-user-code-1

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
